Detailed Description

tmrm_literal represents literal values of properties.

A literal consists of a datatype and the value itself.

Function Documentation

const tmrm_char_t* tmrm_literal_datatype ( const tmrm_literal *  lit  ) 

Returns the datatype of a literal.

Returns:
NULL on failure.
